name: You Complete Me (itch)
description:
In You Complete Me, your objective is to make a snowman that is "Just Right" by ensuring the base, body, and head are the right size. This will earn you a "Snowflake" for the level. Unlock additional worlds and levels by accumulating snowflakes

-----------------------------------------------

A Snowman that's "Just Right"

---------------------------------------------

A Snowman that's "Not Quite"

By: Greg Kozma and Kevin Pauly
